metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5632 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquito before and including 2.0.5, establishing a connection to the mosquitto server without sending data causes the EPOLLOUT event to be added, which results excessive CPU consumption. This could be used by a malicious actor to perform denial of service type attack. This issue is fixed in 2.0.6

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
